title: Requirements approval: playback-samples-with-keys
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Add two more acceptance criterias written below:

- **Given** more than two samples are loaded, **when** an user presses multiple keys at the same time, **then** samples associated with these keys are played simultaneously in overlapping layers.
- **Given** an user plays a sample and it is not finished yet, **when** a user presses the key mapped the sample being played now again, **then**  sounds of the sample overlaps partialy.

comments.comment:
